node.title: Pornhub's Most Commonly Searched-For Fictional Characters Revealed
node.alt: Image shows the most searched video game characters on Pornhub in 2021. Lara Croft from "Tomb Raider" is at the top of the list.
node.description: As part of its Year in Review feature, Pornhub has revealed which characters in movies, cartoons and video games have been searched for the most in 2021.
node.content:
["As well as breaking down the search habits of each individual country, Pornhub's Year in Review also lists the website's most popular fictional characters.", "The annual roundup is based on data compiled by the adult website's own statisticians and researchers. It contains insights about things like the differences between Gen Z and boomers' porn consumption and if any U.S. states have unusual sex kinks.", "However, one area that might be of particular interest is the section dedicated to fictional people. Here, the website has assembled separate lists of the most commonly searched characters from movies, TV shows and cartoons, as well as video games.", "It's worth noting that this data is just based on the number of searches in 2021, rather than on individual video hits. As such, it can be difficult to ascertain what type of videos are most popular (whether they are animated or involve an element of cosplay). In some cases, the chart just lists the name of the show or movie, meaning that you can't always tell if there is a specific character that people are looking for.", "Nevertheless, it's still a fascinating subject to explore. Here are all of the insights from the Pornhub Year in Review 2021.", "
Most Searched Movie Characters on Pornhub in 2021
", "When it comes to movie characters, superheroes dominated the list. Wonder Woman, Black Widow, Spider-Man, Catwoman, Batgirl, Joker, Deadpool and Captain Marvel all place somewhere in the top 20, with Harley Quinn taking the number 1 spot.", "In general, the searches are mostly related to well-established properties (Harley Quinn has regularly topped previous years' lists) and don't feel innately rooted in \"2021.\" That is with the exception of Free Guy and Ghostbusters, which just had a new sequel, but those are sitting right at the bottom of the pile anyway.", "There are also a few animated films here, such as The Incredibles and Hotel Transylvania.", "", "
Image shows the most searched movies and movie characters of 2021 on Pornhub. Harley Quinn is at the top of the list.
", "
Most Searched TV Show and Cartoon Characters on Pornhub
", "While Squid Game emerged as the most searched TV show of the year on Google, it wasn't quite as big on Pornhub.", "In fact, the Netflix Original only managed to land the thirteenth spot here, lagging behind things like Rick and Morty, Teen Titans, Family Guy, Scooby Doo and even SpongeBob SquarePants.", "Generally speaking, this list is very heavy on cartoons, with Game of Thrones being the highest placed live-action show (and that came in twelfth).", "As for the top spot, that went to The Simpsons, although this is just a generic search term, so it's impossible to know if it's for a specific character.", "", "
Image shows the most searched TV shows and cartoons on Pornhub in 2021. The Simpsons is at the top of the list.
", "
Most Searched Video Game Characters on Pornhub
", "Finally, when it comes to video game characters there is representation from a bunch of different franchises.", "Claire Redfield, Jill Valentine and Ada Wong from Resident Evil are all on the list (but Lady Dimitrescu is surprisingly absent) and Nintendo IPs are quite prominent as well. Mario, Princess Peach, Link and an assortment of Pok\u00e9mon are in the top 20, while Bowsette (a gender-swapped version of Bowser) returns after being the most searched character of 2018, although she has been knocked down a few places this year.", "Another fascinating inclusion is Abby from The Last of Us Part II, as she is a character who has been at the center of a lot of controversy, especially in relation to how she looks. In particular, some have criticized the character for having an \"unrealistic body type\" and of not being \"feminine\" enough, due to her large muscles. So it's interesting to see that she has been searched a lot on Pornhub.", "As for the top spot, that went to Lara Croft, who is another staple of these annual lists.", "", "
Image shows the most searched video game characters on Pornhub in 2021. Lara Croft from \"Tomb Raider\" is at the top of the list.
"]
